content.rendered:
13+

Years Experiance

Finlon

About Company

 Mariner Finance Solution at a Glance.

Our customer-centric financial solutions create real competition for traditional loan & finance corporations.

 Mariner Finance Group is an energetic loan and finance firm rapidly growing across Africa. Since expanding from South Africa years back, we have followed a steady and managed upward progression, and continually focused on developing a world-class business through strategic location choices.

It is the essence of what we stand for: uplifting people for the greater good of their country. We provide the financial aids they need to build brighter futures and stronger nations, fueled by their participation in a growing economy.

Investment Plan

77%

Consulting Experience

68%
  • Financial solutions to enrich lives.
  • Committed to a collaborative, consultative approach.
  • Saving facilities and investment solutions.
  • Asset-backed lending and other secure lending products.
  • Facilitate unsecured loans and ensure reliable collection through salary deductions and direct debits.

REVOLUTIONIZING LENDING

As a leading fintech company, Mariner Finance has been missioned to revolutionize traditional lending services since 2013.

Leveraging on propriety risk management technology and big data analytics, pioneered a seamless mobile lending experience, that is fully online, fully automated, fully instant. Eliminating the expenses for physical branches or complex processes, we are able deliver our customers for the swiftest, most seamless lending service in a matter of seconds.

 

Ground Breaking Spirit

“The definition of insanity is doing the same thing over again and expecting a different result” once said by the famous Einstein. Mariner Finance shares that same passion, adopting technology to revolutionize the traditional lending services, constantly breaking the conventions, strive to improve our customer’s lending experiences.

Data Risk Management

 Mariner Finance’s original We Defend, with the breakthrough use of technology to real time analyse big data, automatically assess the degree of risk, allowing us to quote instantly online, with the perfect balance of stable risk management, and speedy approval.

Safe Cyber Security

The importance of cyber security is unquestionable. Mariner Finance has comprehensive system security and monitoring measures, coupled with rigorous identity authentication procedures and privacy policies, to ensure customer privacy is well protected.

Our Team

We are a band of experienced finance and technology professionals looking to transform the consumer finance industry. We are a focused and fearless group of people who are serious about delivering the best financial products our customers have ever used.

Warning: You have to repay your loans. Don’t pay  intermediaries.

Customer Service/ Complaint Hotline： +27875102028

(Monday to Friday, 8am-6pm)

  • Simple
  • Transparent
  • Secure

Get quick business loans

Apply For Loan

our testimonials

What they’re talking about
our company

Fundiswa M.

Personal Loan

Enye yezona nkampani mboleko zibalaseleyo eMzantsi Afrika. Ndigqibe yonke into kwi-intanethi kwaye imali mboleko yam yamkelwe, ndahlawulwa kwangolo suku.

Robert Coetzee Gouws

Finance

Friendly customer service, easy application and same day approval.. quick and efficient.

Chiza Ndaba

Debt Consolidate

I had to wait for 5 hours to get my consolidation loan approved. but I was paid out same day. Atleast I'm now stress free

Zinhle Lukhozi

Their service is great and the response is quick. Thank you marina finance.

Onkabetse Lesalagae

Inkonzo enhle. Imali mboleko ishesha kakhulu ukugunyaza kanye nenkokhelo esheshayo. Ngingancoma wonke umuntu ukuthi azame ukubolekwa imali kwe-marina finance futhi ajabule 🙂

Nazima Govender

From all the loan companies this one is not fake, i got a loan in 2 hours on my account

Delicia Solomons

Gebruik hulle die afgelope jaar uitstekende diens

Warren Dollie

Very reliable. Highly recommended!

Nokuthula Sunduza

Personal Loan

Finance of Choice and efficiency. Thank you Marina Finance for always being so quick to respond and for follow up.
